scripts.text:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [Audit].[mig_objects_list];
CREATE TABLE [Audit].[mig_objects_list] (
    id int identity(1,1),
    objectname varchar(1000),
    systemname varchar(1000),
    category varchar(1000),
    sql text,
    enabled int,
    order_position int,
    extract int,
    load int,
    insert_datetime datetime default GETDATE()
);

--- Lead
insert into [Audit].[mig_objects_list] (objectname , systemname , category, sql, enabled, order_position,extract, load) values ('Account','Salesforce','Salesforce Standard',null,1,0,1,1);
insert into [Audit].[mig_objects_list] (objectname , systemname , category, sql, enabled, order_position,extract, load) values ('Contact','Salesforce','Salesforce Standard',null,1,0,1,1);
insert into [Audit].[mig_objects_list] (objectname , systemname , category, sql, enabled, order_position,extract, load) values ('Lead','Salesforce','Salesforce Standard',
'
select
Name,
Title,
Company,
Phone,
MobilePhone,
Fax,
Email,
Website,
PhotoUrl,
Description,
LeadSource,
Status,
Industry,
Rating,
AnnualRevenue,
NumberOfEmployees,
HasOptedOutOfEmail,
IsConverted,
ConvertedDate,
IsUnreadByOwner,
CreatedDate,
LastModifiedDate,
LastActivityDate,
DoNotCall,
HasOptedOutOfFax,
LastViewedDate,
LastReferencedDate,
LastTransferDate,
Jigsaw,
EmailBouncedReason,
EmailBouncedDate,
IsPriorityRecord,
DB_Created_Date_without_Time__c,
DB_Lead_Age__c,
Lead_Record_ID__c,
Unica_AddressLine1__c,
Unica_AddressLine2__c,
Unica_Address__c,
Unica_Base_ID__c,
Unica_City__c,
Unica_MDB_ID__c,
Unica_ZipCode__c,
smagicinteract__SMSOptOut__c,
smagicinteract__CurrentGenerators__c,
smagicinteract__NumberofLocations__c,
smagicinteract__Primary__c,
smagicinteract__ProductInterest__c,
smagicinteract__SICCode__c,
smagicinteract__TestDate__c,
ASF3__ProductInterest__c
from SF_archive.Lead
where IsDeleted =0
',1,0,1,1);
